name: Morphus
description:
Morphus is a roguelike that features procedural generation, strategic combat and lots of unique items and abilities. You play a creature capable of changing form and complex magic. Morph into characters, monsters, items and objects to take advantage of their stats and abilities.

Form a party to fight monsters in a dynamic turn-based combat packed with mechanics.

Key Features

  • Procedural generation
  • Party system(not mandatory)
  • Turn-based combat with turn-based projectiles and motion
  • No random encounters, no separate battle screen
  • Monster companion system
  • Crafting
  • Quests
  • Non-linear gameplay
  • Permadeath
